title: Fans go wild as McDonald's announce they're selling their famous Big Mac for 99p
text:
Hungry fans have said they 'can't wait' to get their hands on McDonald's latest offer after the chain announced it will be selling Mac for just 99p.

Diners said they'll be rushing to their nearest restaurant to buy one, but they'll need to be quick since the offer is for one day only on November 5.

The fast food chain's flagship burger usually sell for £3.19, meaning customers can get a huge 70 per cent off.

Taking to Facebook, diners were delighted by the offer writing they'll be heading down to get their hands on the burger.

'Oooh yes please' one hungry customer wrote, while another joked, 'we will be back then'.

'I think that's dinner that day sorted' a third added, while another keen customer said, 'on my way'.

'Important information!' commented another.

Taking to Facebook, diners were delighted by the offer writing they'll be heading down to get their hands on the burger - which is made up of two beef burgers sandwiched between three slices of bread

While one keen customer added: 'We'll have to go back, I see no other option'.

More than 1,000 of the chain's UK restaurants are participating in the offer, but 127 aren't.

To claim the 99p burger, you'll need the McDonald's app, which is free to download on iOS and Android devices.

You will then need to register an account and provide details such as your name, and email address.

The 24-hour 99p offer will be listed in the deals section of the app, where you can purchase and head to your nearest store to pick up.

For full terms and conditions and participating restaurants, head to the McDonald's website.
description: Diners say they'll be rushing to their nearest restaurant in the UK to buy the Big Mac, discounted from £3.19, but they'll need to be quick because the offer is only on sale for one day on November 5.
